description: The number of ways one can assign values to n arrays a_{1},...,a_{n} of increasing size (size of a_{1} is 1, size of a_{2} is 2, ..., size of a_{n} is n) using the numbers 1, ..., n*(n+1)/2, distinctly, such that the positions of array a_{i} can only be assigned values in the interval ((n+1)-i),... , (n*(n+1)/2-(n-i)).
